thread.title: Russia backs U.S.-North Korea contacts, sending foreign minister to Pyongyang | North Korean Insight

title: Russia backs U.S.-North Korea contacts, sending foreign minister to Pyongyang | North Korean Insight
text:
Russia backs U.S.-North Korea contacts, sending foreign minister to Pyongyang April 10, 2018 | Reuters | Shares: 0 
MOSCOW (Reuters) â€“ Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov held talks with his North Korean counterpart, Ri Yong Ho, on Tuesday, and said afterwards that Moscow supported contacts between North Korea and the United States.
